title: Comparison Operators
description: In this task, read the four expressions in this program and decide whether each is a true or false statement. Then drag over the correct answer block. Run the program and select the check button to see if you are right.
hint:
This problem puts together what you have learned about expressions and comparisons. Comparisons include less than, greater than, less than equal, greater than equal, and not equal(i.e. <, >, <=, >=, and not=). These compare two values and return true or false.

Read through each problem and follow the order of operation rules.
